data.title: Folk Alley Radio Show List
data.meta_description: Below you will find a list of all the radio stations that play the Folk Alley Radio Show, organized by the day the of week the show is aired. If you would like to see a map of radio stations by location, please see the main Folk Alley Radio Show page. Monday: WFHB: 91.3; www.wfhb.org; … Continued
data.text:
Below you will find a list of all the radio stations that play the Folk Alley Radio Show, organized by the day the of week the show is aired. If you would like to see a map of radio stations by location, please see the main Folk Alley Radio Show page.

Monday:

WFHB: 91.3; www.wfhb.org; Bloomington, IN; Monday 4-6a

KLCC: 89.7; www.klcc.org; Eugene, OR; Monday 8-10p; Repeaters:

Eugene KLCC 89.7 FM [HD]; Bend KLBR 88.1 FM [HD]; Cottage Grove KLCC 91.5 FM; Florence KLFO 88.1 FM [HD]; Newport KLCO 90.5 FM [HD]; Oakridge KLCC 91.5 FM; Reedsport KLFR 89.1 FM [HD]; ; Riddle KLCC 103.9 FM; Roseburg KMPQ 88.1 FM; Sisters KLCC 90.3 FM

WOUB: 91.3; http://woub.org; Ohio University (Athens); Monday 2-4a; Saturday 6-8a

Repeaters: 89.1 Cambridge WOUC; 89.1 Ironton WOUL; 91.9 Chillicothe WOUH; and 90.1 Zanesville WOUZ

Southern Branch Bluegrass: internet only, also LP 91.7; East Tennessee, Powell, TN

https://www.sbbradio.org/; Monday 3-5a

WEJP-LP: 107.1; Facebook; Wheeling, West Virginia; Monday 8-10p

Tuesday:

WLXU: 93.9; Radio Lex; Lexington, KY; Tuesday 9a-11a; 8p-10p

WTIP: 90.7; www.wtip.org; “North Shore Community Radio”; Grand Marais, MN; Tuesday 4-5p; Repeaters: Grand Portage, MN 90.1

WEJP-LP: 107.1; Facebook; Wheeling, West Virginia; Tuesday 11a-1p

WETS: 89.5; www.wets.org; Johnson City, TN; HD2: Tuesday 9-11p
